r.d: Provides PHP and JavaScript libraries for performing AJAX (Communication from JavaScript to your browser without reloading the page)
r.n: * Gzip compression Support * Fix for Bug #12129 Error with URL generated using HTML_AJAX_Helper::setupAJAX() * Add an option to optionally combined js libraries * Fix for bug #12415 - Return value of makeRequest in formSubmit when doing a async request * Fix for bug #13113 - Opera, JavaScript and XMLSerializer
